ygData.subject: Re: Freeport Cleric Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Geez, what s the big deal trying to help you communicate better in the written format?  You get all bent outta shape at him ... maybe we *should* just move
ygData.messageBody:
--- The Scotts <jtscott@...> wrote:
> Jeez what happened did this board turn into a
> English class or something so what my typing skills
> suck

Geez, what's the big deal trying to help you
communicate better in the written format? You get all
bent outta shape at him ... maybe we *should* just
move to the iconology society (no letters or numbers,
just symbols to mean things) if people can't handle
simple conventions like English.
===
:D
Dave's World
-No matter where you go, there you are-
"People will believe a lie either because they want to
believe it's true, or because they fear it is." Wizard's
First Rule, Sword of Truth, Terry Goodkind
